project_abstract.cdata: The objectives of the project are to reduce pollution of international and Chinese territorial waters caused by ship's wastes through: a) improved monitoring and analysis of the nature and magnitude of the problem; b) improved policy, regulatory, and incentive frameworks; and c) the provision of infrastructure to receive and safely dispose of ship wastes.  The project consists of two components: a national component and a ports component.  The national component will: 1) establish baseline data on international ship traffic, related waste types and quantities through a pilot interport ship waste monitoring system (SEATRACK); 2) prepare a comprehensive accident (oil pollution) contingency plan for each port; 3) initiate a Large Marine Ecosystem (LME) monitoring program for the Yellow Sea; 4) undertake a study of the treatment of chemically contaminated water; 5) upgrade environmental monitoring capabilities at the ports, coastal waters and international waters; and 6) provide consultant's services and training.  The port's component will: i) define, design, and provide land-based collection and disposal facilities at the ports of Dalian, Tianjin, Shanghai, Ningbo, Xiamen and Guangzhou; and ii) upgrade environmental monitoring and enforcement capabilities of each of the port authorities.

P003630.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>港口船舶废弃物处理项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的目标是减少国际水域和中国水域内船舶排污废弃物所造成的污染，为此将采取以下措施：（1）加强对该问题性质和严重程度的监测和分析；（2）完善政策、法规和激励框架；（3）建设基础设施，接纳并安全处理船舶所排废弃物。项目设有两个子项目：国家子项目和港口子项目。其中，国家子项目将：（1）通过港际船舶排放废弃物情况监测系统试点，确立关于国际船舶流量、相关废物类型和数量的基底数据；（2）为各港口编制综合性事故（油污染）应急方案；（3）启动实施黄海大型海洋生态系统监测项目；（4）就受化学品污染水的处理情况开展研究；（5）提升对港口、沿海水域和国际水域进行环境监测的能力；（6）提供咨询服务和培训。港口子项目将：（1）确定、设计并建设大连、天津、上海、宁波、厦门和广州等港口的陆地收集和处理设施；（2）提升各港务局的环境监测和环境执法能力。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
